Article.ArticleTitle: Long COVID and cardiovascular disease: a learning health system approach.

Abstract.AbstractText: Cardiovascular disease is both a risk factor and potential outcome of the direct, indirect and long-term effects of COVID-19. A recent analysis in >150,000 survivors of COVID-19 demonstrates an increased 1-year risk of numerous cardiovascular diseases. Preventing and managing this new disease burden presents challenges to health systems and requires a learning health system approach.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Institute of Health Informatics, University College London, London, UK.
